content:
hello everybody,
hope you are doing well?
I want to know how to map my database schema to FHIR using nodejs

If you're interested in how to use the javascript reference implementation to simplify mapping, you might browse and then ask more specific questions on #javascript. If you're interested in general strategies for mapping from legacy storage structures to FHIR, you might browse and ask more specific questions on #storage for FHIR. Your current question is a little broad and the short answer is "with quite a bit of work that will be very specific to your particular implementation"...
@Lloyd McKenzie Thanks let me do this
